name: 2248 Block Stack
description:
The rules are simple:
1. Adjust the drop point of the falling number.
2. The same number is merged.
3. Do not let the bottom number reach the top.

Features:
◉ Well-designed eliminate roles。
◉ Auto save and record replay.
◉ Tablet support
◉ Global Leaderboards

2248 BLOCK STACK is Suit for all age and completely FREE to play!
Now play and become the king player in 2248 BLOCK STACK!
